```py
In [1]: import pandas as pd
        data = pd.Series([0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0],
                         index=['a', 'b', 'c', 'd'])
        data
Out[1]: a    0.25
        b    0.50
        c    0.75
        d    1.00
        dtype: float64
```

```py
In [3]: 'a' in data
Out[3]: True
```

```py
In [4]: data.keys()
Out[4]: Index(['a', 'b', 'c', 'd'], dtype='object')
```

```py
In [6]: data['e'] = 1.25
        data
Out[6]: a    0.25
        b    0.50
        c    0.75
        d    1.00
        e    1.25
        dtype: float64
```

```py
In [7]: # slicing by explicit index
        data['a':'c']
Out[7]: a    0.25
        b    0.50
        c    0.75
        dtype: float64
```

```py
In [8]: # slicing by implicit integer index
        data[0:2]
Out[8]: a    0.25
        b    0.50
        dtype: float64
```

```py
In [9]: # masking
        data[(data > 0.3) & (data < 0.8)]
Out[9]: b    0.50
        c    0.75
        dtype: float64
```

```py
In [10]: # fancy indexing
         data[['a', 'e']]
Out[10]: a    0.25
         e    1.25
         dtype: float64
```

```py
In [11]: data = pd.Series(['a', 'b', 'c'], index=[1, 3, 5])
         data
Out[11]: 1    a
         3    b
         5    c
         dtype: object
```

```py
In [12]: # explicit index when indexing
         data[1]
Out[12]: 'a'
```

```py
In [13]: # implicit index when slicing
         data[1:3]
Out[13]: 3    b
         5    c
         dtype: object
```

```py
In [14]: data.loc[1]
Out[14]: 'a'
```

```py
In [15]: data.loc[1:3]
Out[15]: 1    a
         3    b
         dtype: object
```

```py
In [16]: data.iloc[1]
Out[16]: 'b'
```

```py
In [17]: data.iloc[1:3]
Out[17]: 3    b
         5    c
         dtype: object
```

```py
In [18]: area = pd.Series({'California': 423967, 'Texas': 695662,
                           'Florida': 170312, 'New York': 141297,
                           'Pennsylvania': 119280})
         pop = pd.Series({'California': 39538223, 'Texas': 29145505,
                          'Florida': 21538187, 'New York': 20201249,
                          'Pennsylvania': 13002700})
         data = pd.DataFrame({'area':area, 'pop':pop})
         data
Out[18]:                 area       pop
         California    423967  39538223
         Texas         695662  29145505
         Florida       170312  21538187
         New York      141297  20201249
         Pennsylvania  119280  13002700
```

```py
In [19]: data['area']
Out[19]: California      423967
         Texas           695662
         Florida         170312
         New York        141297
         Pennsylvania    119280
         Name: area, dtype: int64
```

```py
In [20]: data.area
Out[20]: California      423967
         Texas           695662
         Florida         170312
         New York        141297
         Pennsylvania    119280
         Name: area, dtype: int64
```

```py
In [21]: data.pop is data["pop"]
Out[21]: False
```

```py
In [26]: data['area']
Out[26]: California      423967
         Texas           695662
         Florida         170312
         New York        141297
         Pennsylvania    119280
         Name: area, dtype: int64
```

```py
In [27]: data.iloc[:3, :2]
Out[27]:               area       pop
         California  423967  39538223
         Texas       695662  29145505
         Florida     170312  21538187
```

```py
In [28]: data.loc[:'Florida', :'pop']
Out[28]:               area       pop
         California  423967  39538223

```

```py
In [29]: data.loc[data.density > 120, ['pop', 'density']]
Out[29]:                pop     density
         Florida   21538187  126.463121
         New York  20201249  142.970120
```

```py
In [31]: data['Florida':'New York']

```

```py
In [33]: data[data.density > 120]
```
